Archive_Addon_Paragraph: Retain your organization's data for as long as it is needed, archiving old Transactions, Activities, and Transaction Lines based on the number of months back you wish to keep. Define a default setting for months to retain, and specific retention policies for each activity type.
Archive_Addon_Schedule_Paragraph: Set the day and time for data archiving. It is recommended to choose a time during low business activity with Pepperi.
Archive_Addon_Policy_Paragraph: Number of months for the default data retention period for all activities. Define retention per activity below.
Archive_Addon_MinItemsTitle: Min records to retain (in case fewer records exist in the max months setting)
Addon_Archive_DeleteModal_Paragraph: Are you sure you want to delete this Activity from the data retention policy?
Addon_Archive_PublishModal_Success: Your data retention policy is saved and will be in effect on the next scheduled run.
Addon_Archive_ExecuteModal_Paragraph:
Are you sure? Keep in mind that it is not recommended to archive data during peak business hours.
If you confirm, any updated data retention settings will be applied and archiving will run.
Addon_Archive_PublishModal_Failure: Publish data process has failed. Error message: {{message}}
Addon_Archive_Executing_Paragraph:
Data retention is running.

View execution log
It can take up to several minutes for the log to appear.
Addon_Archive_ReportModal_Paragraph:
Generating your report... 
 This can take a few minutes, you can close the window and a link to the report will be added to the title when he's ready
